entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • It_does_not_download_desktop_targeting_packs_on_unix doesn't work for SDK redist (only redist-installer) #42230
  • [9.0-preview.7] Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildWorkloadSdkResolver fails with dotnet workload or build on Windows #42211

Closed

  • calling dotnet publish with output multiple times creates new subfolder each time #42223
  • Allow pinning Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref version #42199

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable crossgen when poisoning #42228
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Fix subpath issue on SWA dev manifest #42227
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42224
    Branch Lockdown
  • Report better error when `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package is not downloaded #42216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package description #42212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support to generate SBRP usage report #42200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit loose manifest priority #41996
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.8
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42213
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] update warning message for containers package inclusion #40628
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Mark the new `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package as shipping #42208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix expected exit code for mono in source-build smoke tests #42209
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Mono Stage 2 Leg to VMR SB #41606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard Installer EndToEnd tests to Helix #42195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automated test to verify that the custom culture is respected #42174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix userlocal #41735
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workload History (part 4) #42020
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
